IntVectorProperty.name: Dimension
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Dimension of the image. MapQuest: min 170x30, max 1920x1920. GoogleMap: min 2x2, max 640x640 (2048x2048 for premium plan key).

IntVectorProperty.name: Provider
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Which provider to use. (An account is required) GoogleMap: https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/maps-static/get-api-key MapQuest: https://developer.mapquest.com/plan_purchase/steps/business_edition/business_edition_free/register

IntVectorProperty.name: MapType
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Defines the map format to construct.

IntVectorProperty.name: Upscale
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: If this property is enabled, the dimension are upscaled. Note that the download of the map can be longer.

StringVectorProperty.name: APIKey
StringVectorProperty.label: API Key
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: API key used for the selected provider. This key can be generated from the provider website when an account has been created.

IntVectorProperty.name: FetchingMethod
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Which method is used to localize the data to fetch.

IntVectorProperty.name: ZoomLevel
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Defines the zoom level of the map, which determines the magnification level of the map.

SourceProxy.label: Geographical Map Fetcher
SourceProxy.name: GeoMapFetcher

Documentation.long_help: Download an image map from a geolocation provider.

SourceProxy.Documentation: This source fetches an image from a geolocation provider based on the coordinates and the zoom level. An account is required to get an API key from the selected provider.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Center
DoubleVectorProperty.label: Lat/Lon
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Latitude and longitude of the center in degrees.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: MapBoundingBox
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Defines the bounding box of the map.Format is {minLat, maxLat, minLong, maxLong}

SourceProxy.name: GeoMapConvert
SourceProxy.label: Geographical Map Conversion

Documentation.long_help: Convert an image from a specific projection to an other.
Documentation.short_help: Convert an image to an other projection.

SourceProxy.Documentation: Convert a 2D image data from a specific projection to a structured grid in an other projection supported by the PROJ library.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the input to the GeoConversion filter.

IntVectorProperty.name: SourceProjection
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the preconfigured source projection. If Custom is selected, a valid PROJ4 string must be provided.

StringVectorProperty.name: CustomSourceProjection
StringVectorProperty.label: Source PROJ4
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: PROJ4 String used to configure the source projection. See documentation here: https://proj.org/usage/projections.html

IntVectorProperty.name: DestinationProjection
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the preconfigured destination projection. If Custom is selected, a valid PROJ4 string must be provided.

StringVectorProperty.name: CustomDestProjection
StringVectorProperty.label: Destination PROJ4
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: PROJ4 String used to configure the destination projection. See documentation here: https://proj.org/usage/projections.html

SourceProxy.name: GeoMapFetcherMeshFilter
SourceProxy.label: Geographical Map Mesh Fetcher

Documentation.long_help: Download an image map from a geolocation provided by a mesh.

SourceProxy.Documentation: This source fetches an image from a geolocation provider based on the coordinates provided by the bounding box of a mesh. An account is required to get an API key from the selected provider.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the input to the GeoMapFetcherMesh filter.

IntVectorProperty.name: MeshProjection
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the mesh projection. If Custom is selected, a valid PROJ4 string must be provided.

StringVectorProperty.name: CustomMeshProjection
StringVectorProperty.label: Mesh PROJ4
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: PROJ4 String used to configure the mesh projection. See documentation here: https://proj.org/usage/projections.html
